meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Susan Powell-Turton Scott Cooper Frank Hughes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #532.

div.div: Frank Hughes game 5. Missing Susan's introduction.

td.p: Susan Powell-Turton, originally from Fort Worth, Texas
Scott Cooper, an Army lawyer from Washington, D.C.
Frank Hughes, an account executive from Torrance, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $24,300)

tr.td: SPECIFICALLY SPEAKING
LAKES & RIVERS
FEMALE FACTS
SPECTATOR SPORTS
DINING OUT
MORTAL MATTERS
(Alex: Sounds ominous.)
